TopicTitle: So I had a nightmare... About KSP

Articles.Content:
It was pretty strange, and I'll try to remember every inch of detail. It began with me landing on a snowy-like celestial body. I could almost guarantee it was Eeloo. Coincidentally the only planet I haven't gone to yet. I was getting pretty close to landing. All of a sudden I heard a bump, it's hard to describe. It wasn't a horror-movie bump but a deep, low kind of bump. It was silent, about 50m from surface and 2 bumps this time, the same sound. Then I finally landed. Then the bump got WAYY higher in volume, and all of a sudden green squid-like creatures came out of nowhere and started attacking the ship, it took about 2 seconds for the green squid-like creatures to explode the ship. After the ship was destroyed a LOOUDD screamer popped up, I don't remember what it was of, but it was pretty dang loud. It was so creepy and scary because it happened so suddenly, and everything went black after everything was destroyed. I remember seeing a Manley video (WTF) on these monsters, and it again was on Eeloo. The same thing happened, I don't exactly remember what Scott said, or even how it went. I do remember scrolling down to the comments and people saying things like "I CRAPPED MY PANTS" "THAT SCARED ME SO BAD" bla.

I could totally see this happening for April Fools or Halloween or something similar.

And I read this just before I go to sleep... Great!

Edit: reminds me of Apollo 18

Well, you know what they say: you know you play too much KSP when you have detailed dream about it!

By the way, which video of Manley is about those squids(I'm sure it's the Kraken)?

EDIT: I was ninja'd.... by two ninjas...

Well, you know what they say: you know you play too much KSP when you have detailed dream about it!

By the way, which video of Manley is about those squids(I'm sure it's the Kraken)?

EDIT: I was ninja'd.... by two ninjas...

I should've been more precise.

I'm talking about a... Nonexistent video.
Well, I won't be going to Eeloo anytime soon... Nor will I be sleeping tonight... *shudders*

It may not sound so scary to you guys, but those low.. Deep.. Sounds will haunt me forever.

And the screamer. That horrifying distorted scream.
Your therapist has a lot to answer for..
Its like one of those dreams where people ( or "things" ) are chasing you, but can't run, or you keep falling, only this is being eating by kraken babies

Your therapist has a lot to answer for..

Yes... Yes you do...

*Sigh* You're lucky!

I dream about such mundane things like women and ruling the world.
Reminds me of a show I watched last night, Europa 1. It's a pretty nice movie.
My KSP nightmares usually involve the vengeful ghosts of all the Kerbals I've killed making fiendish machines whose only purpose is to kill Kerbals in a humorous manner .

About the screamers...

You click too many youtube comment links.
I made an artist's impression:
